analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/14/0xdf2a54b186adaac82b59dab64080faee96d36861.sol:
	Contract TerraformReserve has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/14/0xdf2a54b186adaac82b59dab64080faee96d36861.sol#197-199)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Reentrancy in TokenVesting._releaseTo (/unique_chucks/14/0xdf2a54b186adaac82b59dab64080faee96d36861.sol#290-299):
	External calls:
	- unreleased = releasableAmount() (/unique_chucks/14/0xdf2a54b186adaac82b59dab64080faee96d36861.sol#292-293)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- released (/unique_chucks/14/0xdf2a54b186adaac82b59dab64080faee96d36861.sol#293-296)

Reentrancy in TokenVesting.revoke (/unique_chucks/14/0xdf2a54b186adaac82b59dab64080faee96d36861.sol#309-318):
	External calls:
	- _releaseTo(beneficiary) (/unique_chucks/14/0xdf2a54b186adaac82b59dab64080faee96d36861.sol#311)
	- token.safeTransfer(owner,token.balanceOf(this)) (/unique_chucks/14/0xdf2a54b186adaac82b59dab64080faee96d36861.sol#313-316)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- revoked (/unique_chucks/14/0xdf2a54b186adaac82b59dab64080faee96d36861.sol#316-317)

TerraformReserve.setTargetContract (/unique_chucks/14/0xdf2a54b186adaac82b59dab64080faee96d36861.sol#184-194) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-manaToken.approve(landClaim,totalLocked) (/unique_chucks/14/0xdf2a54b186adaac82b59dab64080faee96d36861.sol#189-193)

TokenVesting.releaseForeignToken (/unique_chucks/14/0xdf2a54b186adaac82b59dab64080faee96d36861.sol#346-351) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-_token.transfer(owner,amount) (/unique_chucks/14/0xdf2a54b186adaac82b59dab64080faee96d36861.sol#350-351)

Reentrancy in TerraformReserve.lockMana (/unique_chucks/14/0xdf2a54b186adaac82b59dab64080faee96d36861.sol#159-170):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(manaToken.transferFrom(_from,this,mana)) (/unique_chucks/14/0xdf2a54b186adaac82b59dab64080faee96d36861.sol#167)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- lockedBalance (/unique_chucks/14/0xdf2a54b186adaac82b59dab64080faee96d36861.sol#167-169)
	- totalLocked (/unique_chucks/14/0xdf2a54b186adaac82b59dab64080faee96d36861.sol#169)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/14/0xdf2a54b186adaac82b59dab64080faee96d36861.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.13 (/unique_chucks/14/0xdf2a54b186adaac82b59dab64080faee96d36861.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_token' of TerraformReserve.TerraformReserve (/unique_chucks/14/0xdf2a54b186adaac82b59dab64080faee96d36861.sol#152-153) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_from' of TerraformReserve.lockMana (/unique_chucks/14/0xdf2a54b186adaac82b59dab64080faee96d36861.sol#159-161) is not in mixedCase
